title: Anton Toropanov – Front-end Developer

about.intro: Since my schooldays I have been <mark>building remarkable, responsive websites</mark> for both desktop and mobile
about.experience: I have a diverse set of skills, ranging from design, to complex project development, with <mark>over 6 years experience.</mark> </br></br> I am trying to keep myself up to date and staying close to new tools, trends and workflows.

reach_me:
You can reach me via email or find me on social networks. I would love to hear from you!

I want to be involved in projects that I can be proud of, join an amazing team and advance my development career. Let’s together build something amazing.
